T02TD1442E:242a-1: shr'i badzra d'a ka sya sto tra danda ka n'a ma /
T02TD1442E:242a-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba /
T02TD1442E:242a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1442E:242b-2: // / de yi rjes su phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma bzhir bzhugs mkha' 'gro chen mo l'a ma dum skyes gzugs can ma ni yid 'phrog byed ma rnams dang ldan zhing mtshams su kun gnas thod pas bskor cing de nas sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor bzhugs shing sa 'og sa steng mtho ris spyod pa de nyid gsum las khros pa dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug 'khor lo dam pa 'khor lo can ni phyogs dang phyogs min dag na gnas pa'i khva gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad kyis mngon par mchod cing rang gi lha mos mnyam par sbyar ba'i sgeg pa dang ldan bdud kyi sde rnams sngangs par mdzad pa rnam par 'phro ba sems can la ni yang dag chags can sdang la rnam sdang khro la kun khro nyon mongs rnams 'joms 'chi bdag bdud sogs khrag dron btung bas tshim pa'i thugs bde 'jig rten gsum na mdzad pa gcig bzhugs sangs rgyas mdzad brtson rdo rje lha mo'i bde ba reg pa las skyes pa sbu langs pa'i tshogs kyis khyab pa'i sku can spyan gyi rdzi ma g-yo zhing mgur gyi sbubs nas sid kyi sgrar bcas bzhad cing yid 'ong phyag gi zhags pas mgul 'khyud nu ma gnyis rgyas mkhrang rten las byung rdul gyi thigs pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing nyi ma bye ba'i 'od kyi snang bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs khyab cing snyan chas brgyan pa zla ba gzhon nu phyed pa'i mche ba'i myu gu lham me dpal mdzad blo mdzad tshim pa ster zhing rgyas ba ster ba rgyal srid ster zhing dngos grub ster ba phun sum tshogs ba thams cad rab ster 'dren pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro la ni rtag tu 'dud /
T02TD1442E:243a-0: // / dpe med thugs rje'i nyams kyis 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa ma lus rnam @243a * //
T02TD1442E:243b-0: // / ro brgyas spras shing rmad byung 'jigs rungs du ma'i gzugs can ro pa sregs me drag mi mgo rab gtum rus pa dum bu'i tshogs dang skra sogs kyis brgyan bsreg bzhin pa yi yan lag mchog gi klad pa lug cing rkang mar zhag 'thor 'dam ni 'dred pa skra chad pa dang rgyu ma'i phreng ba lang long nar ba mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po ro langs ha ha'i nga ro mthon por sgrogs shing sgrub pa po ni du ma h'um yig gis bsdigs rgyu zhing ce sbyang phat kyi rnam pa'i ku co 'don cing lag bteg gar byed keng rus phreng ba 'khrigs pa dpa' bo'i btung ba'i spro ba las byung dga' ba dang bcas glu snyan len cing gar byed @243b g-yo zhing rol pa rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug tshogs pa bya rgod mchu yis gnon cing bcad pa'i lus kyi khrag gi rgyun 'dzag mun nag can ni ce sbyang gdong las byung ba'i 'bar ba drag po me 'bar tshogs can bdud sde'i tshogs med nag po dus chen 'khrigs pa'i lha rdzas dur khrod brgya da du gar mdzad bla ma he ru ka la bdag gis ngag rnams kyis ni mngon par mchod pa'i bsod nams nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs khyab rab skyes 'di yis skye ba 'di rnams nyon mongs dra ba ma lus spangs nas mnyam med bsod nams phung po bsags nas rab skyes dri med ye shes tshogs ni mngon gyur rang rig yang dag gsal ba dam pa'i 'od kyis gsal byas sna tshogs du ma'i ga'i mug mun nag mtha' yas kun nas bsal ba'i skad cig la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi sku bzhin kun nas rtag tu gyur /
T02TD1442E:243b-2: // / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba rtog ge ba'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi nor bu slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi grags pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1442E:243b-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
T02TD1442E:243b-5: 'di'i gzhung tshad ni bla ma'i phyag dpe la tshig rkang pa bzhi'i re re zhing yi ge sum cu rtsa drug du gnas shing rkang pa bzhi ka bsdoms pas yi ge stong sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bzhugs so //
T02TD1442E:243b-6: bod kyi dpe la ni tshig rkang re re la tsheg par nyis brgya dgu bcu rtsa lnga yod cing /
T02TD1442E:243b-7: bsdoms pas tsheg par stong brgya brgyad cu yod do//
